bib.title: Sentiment analysis based on collaborative data for Polish language
bib.author: Bartusiak, Roman and Kajdanowicz, Tomasz
bib.abstract: Due to the fact that majority of web content is provided within collaborative environments such as social media and social networks systems its complexity brings a new strong need for its accurate aggregation and understanding. Sentiment analysis (also known as opinion mining) is one of possibility to understand generated content that may brings an interesting summation in terms of attitudes expressed in texts. The paper proposes a new approach to sentiment analysis of polish language using machine learning approach.
bib.booktitle: International Conference on Cooperative Design, Visualization and Engineering
